org.snmp4j

Class ScopedPDU

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.snmp4j.PDU
      • org.snmp4j.ScopedPDU
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, BERSerializable

    public class ScopedPDU
extends PDU
    The ScopedPDU class represents a SNMPv3 scoped PDU.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Frank Fock
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
